rows.label: tev071301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb about mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb about the Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb about the Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb about mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_SEL3031
rows.name: Ask Kon'luarb what he intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0001
rows.name:
You've transferred your consciousnesses from your real
bodies to reproductions that are surely bereft of Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0002
rows.name: That sounds like the action of a deranged person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0003
rows.name:
But there is perhaps something we can learn from
the intense desire to persevere that drives you to take
such extraordinary measures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0004
rows.name:
After all, if my people wish to survive on this planet,
we're going to need to display some humanlike
tenacity ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0030
rows.name:
The Ganglion seemed to be in quite a panic over their
failure to eradicate you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0031
rows.name:
After that, they ordered us to immediately begin
developing a new weapon to destroy humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0032
rows.name:
It is a good thing that we were able to defect to
New LA before we were forced to comply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Now we will devote ourselves to developing anti-
Ganglion weaponry. I hope that you'll use their power
to wipe that group off this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0038
rows.name:
I must admit that I have underestimated your people's
strength and tenacity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0039
rows.name:
I am truly impressed that you were able to weather
such a fierce offensive from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0040
rows.name:
Clearly we made the right choice in seeking sanctuary
with humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0041
rows.name:
I hope that you will be able to continue resisting them,
as well as protecting us with those mechanical bodies
of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Your artificial bodies seem to have a number of
functions—such as emotional expression—that have
no utility in combat situations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0047
rows.name:
If you would allow us, we could streamline your
mimeosomes by removing these unnecessary functions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0048
rows.name: May we modify you into remorseless killing machines?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0049
rows.name:
...This does not interest you in the least? Fascinating.
Why would you abandon your bodies and yet adhere
to such needlessly cosmetic features?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0050
rows.name: Yours are a people of many mysteries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Having lost our senirapa water, we Orphe are no
longer capable of reproducing through division as
we always have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0015
rows.name:
We must begin searching for a new source of
senirapa water soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0016
rows.name:
However, the wilds of Mira are quite perilous.
I calculate a 93.5 percent chance that the search team
would be wiped out in the process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0017
rows.name:
We must gather more information from which to derive
an answer on how best to proceed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0018
rows.name:
What do you think? Have you noticed that you're
seeing more Orphe in New LA lately?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0019
rows.name:
This would not have been possible without you.
We took the senirapa water you brought us and began
mass-producing it at the water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0020
rows.name:
As you can see, we were able to successfully produce
multiple new individuals![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Thank you. I will make sure that my gratitude towards
you is passed, along with this body's Ovah,
to my countless future offspring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0055
rows.name:
I would like to keep reproducing until we Orphe return
to our former population level of roughly 20 billion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0056
rows.name:
At that population level, we could endure even large
amounts of predation from indigens without fear of
extinction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0057
rows.name:
Although I suppose that would cause a host of new
problems—such as finding acceptable habitats in which
to live and securing a sufficient supply of plants to eat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0058
rows.name:
But I am confident that by maintaining a strong alliance
with your people, we could overcome such obstacles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG0059
rows.name:
I hope that our people can continue working together
to ensure our mutual survival here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG4001
rows.name:
Recently, red Orphe betaforms have been produced due
to some sort of spontaneous mutation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG4002
rows.name:
I am responsible for overseeing the production of the
senirapa water. Could this have been the cause?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG4003
rows.name:
I have been investigating the matter,
but I have yet to find any abnormalities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG4004
rows.name:
I don't understand it. Until now, we've been able to
consistently reproduce with minimal amounts of
individual variation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071301_MSG4005
rows.name: What could be happening to us?[ST:wait ]
